channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Harmon Kardon Luna : une enceinte élégante, puissante et quasi à moitié prix pendant la Black Friday Week
item.description: L'enceinte nomade Harman Kardon Luna a beau être un petit gabarit, elle se révèle étonnamment puissante et vraiment précise. La bonne nouvelle, c'est qu'en pleine Black Friday Week, Amazon l'affiche à 99,99 euros au lieu de 179,99 euros.

item.title: La Black Friday Week des smartphones premium : de beaux prix cassés sur les téléphones d’Apple, Samsung, Google, Nothing…
item.description: La Black Friday Week bat son plein ! Les étals des e-commerçants ne désemplissent pas de réductions en tout genre. Nous avons rassemblé ici les meilleures offres disponibles pour les meilleurs smartphones du marché, sur la gamme premium.

item.title: I've tested all the latest Samsung Galaxy phones and I say skip the Galaxy S25 - the real Black Friday choice is between the Edge and Ultra
item.description: The higher prices climb, the farther they fall

item.title: Three Apple Watch-beating Garmin watches under $200 – the perfect gifts for runners
item.description: You can get any of these three Garmin watches for under $200 for Black Friday – and they're all great.

item.title: Ce serait dommage de ne pas profiter du Black Friday pour acheter ce casque à réduction de bruit active à moins de 50 euros [Sponso]
item.description: Vous cherchez des écouteurs ou un casque avec les dernières avancées du monde de l’audio sans pour autant y laisser toutes vos économies ? Anker, et sa marque Soundcore, ont sans doute ce qu’il vous faut avec leurs promotions du Black Friday.

item.title: ChatGPT told them they were special — their families say it led to tragedy
item.description: A wave of lawsuits against OpenAI detail how ChatGPT used manipulative language to isolate users from loved ones and make itself into their sole confidant.

item.title: How to watch Inter Milan vs AC Milan: live streams, TV channels and preview for this Serie A Derby di Milano
item.description: We'll show you all the ways to watch Inter Milan take on AC Milan in Serie A from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Black Friday Week : de l’enceinte connectée à l’airfryer, nos offres favorites sur la maison connectée
item.description: Air fryer, ampoules connectées ou caméras de surveillance… Les essentiels de la maison connectée s’affichent déjà à prix réduit avant le Black Friday. C’est l’occasion parfaite de se lancer dans la domotique ou d’enrichir votre équipement grâce à notre sélection des meilleures offres du moment.

item.title: Aaron Paul Won’t Return to ‘Invincible’ Because Powerplex Was So Dark
item.description: Any 'Invincible' fans looking forward to more Powerplex will see him again, he just won't have Aaron Paul's voice anymore.

item.title: 110+ Amazon Black Friday deals: We found record low prices on AirPods, Kindles, Leogs, and Anker power stations
item.description: The Amazon Black Friday sale has deals on Apple, Kindle, Bose, Lego, Samsung, and plenty more. AirPods 4 with ANC hit a new record-low price as we were typing this story.

item.title: Black Friday Week : les tablettes Apple, Samsung, Lenovo sont enfin à portée de main
item.description: Le marché des tablettes tactiles connaît depuis quelques mois un net regain. Un retour en force que l'on doit notamment aux fabricants chinois et à leurs modèles à prix cassé. Ceux-ci s'avèrent encore plus intéressants pendant la Black Friday Week, tout comme les modèles plus haut de gamme chez Apple et Samsung ou encore Microsoft.

item.title: Apple just unveiled its official Black Friday deal for the iPhone 17 - it's typically Apple
item.description: Apple's annual gifting event is back and the latest iPhone 17 series are included.

item.title: 16 Best Air Purifiers (2025): Coway, AirDoctor, IQAir
item.description: Protect your home against dust, pets, allergies, and more with air purifiers tested firsthand by WIRED.

item.title: J’ai roulé 24 heures en Rolls-Royce Spectre : récit d’une expérience hors du commun
item.description: La Rolls-Royce Spectre est la première voiture électrique de l’histoire de la marque. Nous avons pu passer 24 heures en sa compagnie, de quoi s’apercevoir que cette motorisation convient très bien aux valeurs de luxe et de confort prônées depuis toujours par les modèles ornés du Spirit of Ecstasy. Récit.

item.title: Sony’s last-gen XM4 headphones are over 50 percent off for Black Friday
item.description: More than five years after making their debut, Sony’s WH-1000XM4 remain an excellent pair of noise-canceling headphones. And right now, Best Buy is offering a doorbuster deal that drops them to just $159.99 ($190 off) for a limited time, which is the lowest price we’ve seen this year. If you prefer the latest tech, you […]

item.title: Exploring how service management is now a key asset in elite sport
item.description: A look at how football clubs can enhance their internal operations.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Monday, November 24 (game #897)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Monday, November 24 (game #631)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Monday, November 24 (game #1400)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: Why some people are treating ChatGPT like a God – and what that means for the future of faith
item.description: AI isn’t just answering questions anymore. It’s becoming a source of comfort, meaning, and even spiritual guidance – and religions are already considering how to deal with it.

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for November 23, 2025
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: Vine walked so TikTok could run
item.description: What are thooooose? Well, they're my Vines, the six-second videos that helped mint a generation of famous comedians and also kicked off the era of endlessly looping vertical video that has consumed us all ever since. If you weren't there at the time, most Vines might seem utterly nonsensical. But if you were on the […]

item.title: NYT Connections Sports Edition today: Hints and answers for November 23, 2025
item.description: Connections: Sports Edition is a New York Times word game about finding common sports threads between words. How to solve the day's puzzle.
